name: Death Sentence
desc:
❤️‍🩹 Heal the soul to start a new adventure.
🦆 Tweet this to appear in credits.

name: Restless Dream
desc: 💤 Sleep to recover depleted 🟢 Energy.

name: Bad Thought
desc:
🔰 Block or 🌀 Dodge to avoid enemy strikes.
⚔️ Attack when they have no 🟢 Energy

name: Floating Shrimp
desc: 🍴 Eat to restore ❤️ Health and 🟢 Energy.

name: Shaping Decision
desc: Choose a perk to shape your character.

name: Waking Moment
desc: n/a

name: Pile of Rubble
desc: Bunch of stones lying around.

name: Confused Earthworm
desc: Makes a perfect fishing bait.

name: Overgown Cockroach
desc: Carries a giant pair of mandibles.

name: Ruined House
desc: Strange noises are coming out.

name: Haunting Voice
desc: Eerie whispers and screams echoing around.

name: Cotton Ball
desc: Must have been lost recently.

name: Black Cat
desc: These usually bring bad luck.

name: Angry Goose
desc: Peace was never an option.

name: Apple Tree
desc:
A fruit tree in a middle of the village.
Who would have thought.

name: Startled Crow
desc:
The crow appears to be going for the eyes.
Quickly cover before the impact.

name: Ripe Apple
desc: Looks all shiny and juicy.

name: Fruit Worm
desc:
Must have fallen off the apple.
Perfect fishing bait.

name: Alpha Ram
desc:
Getting ready for ramming.
Better dodge the horns.

name: Sparkling Fountain
desc: Full of pristine cold water.

name: Possesive Swan
desc: Peace was never an option.

name: Unsettling House
desc:
There are blood drops leading outside.
But otherwise looks abandoned.

name: Rusty Knife
desc:
The blade still looks sharp a bit.
Perhaps it could be of service.
message: Could still make a bloody mess.

name: Dire Rat
desc:
Appeared out of nowhere.
Probably carries diseases.

name: Rotten Flesh
desc: Could be remains of one of the villagers.

name: Stray Hound
desc:
The creature looks kind of aggressive.
But its eyes say otherwise.

name: Brick Wall
desc: One of the bricks seems loose.

name: Bronze Key
desc: Looks well worn but still usable.

name: Locked Ruin
desc: Strange noises are coming out.

name: Fortune Cookie
desc: Delicious on the first glance.

name: Ancient Knowledge
desc: n/a

desc: Uncanny figure with ellegant moves.

name: Scarab Pin
desc: Fancy pearlescent ornament.

name: Altar of Hatred
desc: There's a blood on the surface.

name: Fresh Sushi
desc: All nicely arranged and untouched.

name: Archery Range
desc: Not a scratch on the target.

name: Pile of Bones
desc: Doesn't look like an accident.

name: Radiating Bow
desc: The pile of bones won't miss it.
message: Shot an arrow in the knee

name: Grass Patch
desc: Good place to catch a breath.
message: A wild animal was hidden there!

name: Poisonous Snake
desc:
Perfectly blends with the surroundings.
Almost stepped on it.

name: Heart-shaped Pebble
desc: Pleasantly warm to the touch.
message: Felt a surge in the chest.

name: Rose Bush
desc:
These are just beautiful.
Perhaps grab some.

name: Eternal Flame
desc: Calming aura radiates around.

name: Shaping Decision
desc: Choose a perk to shape your character.

name: Sunflower Growth
desc: Most are taller than head-level.

name: Flying Diva
desc: Prompts for a lovely conversation.

name: Pearlescent Bird
desc: Peace was never an option.
message: Eyes melted by the feather reflections.

name: Fern Weeds
desc: Chance to catch a breath.

name: Suspicious Mushroom
desc: Exemplar of an unrecognisable species.

name: Psychotic Episode
desc: Strange thoughts filling the mind.

name: Frantic Hooves
desc: Its majestic antlers look rather deadly.

name: Tall Grass
desc: Thick growth obscuring something.

name: Ratcatcher Flute
desc: Decorated magical equipment.

name: Strange Box
desc: Has a small keyhole on top.

name: Sapphire Moth
desc: Pearlescent and classy accessory.

name: Forest Skunk
desc:
Seems having lightning reflexes.
Fight or flight.

name: Dark Grove
desc:
Nothing but endless trees in all directions.
A quiet place to rest.
message: A knife was stuck into it.

name: Twisted Blade
desc: The sacrifical blade demands blood.
message: Released some energy from the inside.

name: Malvolent Spirit
desc: Laughs out loud minacally.

name: Tulip Glade
desc:
Colorful tulips literally everywhere.
Something seems hiding among them.

name: Rainbow Unicorn
desc:
Strange horse approached.
Intentions are unclear.

name: Sweet Honeypot
desc:
Seems like a fine refreshment.
The lid is trembling though.
message: The honeypot was full of bees.

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
The bees instantly swarmed the area.
There's nowhere to run.

name: Bee Larva
desc:
Seems angry of the disturbance.
Handy fishing bait.

name: Honey Badger
desc:
The creature boasts sinister energy.
Better to not underestimate.

name: Ancient Temple
desc: Remains of a long gone civilization.

name: Bloody Cultist
desc: Eyes are glowing blue.

name: Golden Trinket
desc: Reflected sunlight draws the eyesight.

name: Ancient Temple
desc: Wholesome statues gaze upon the altar.

name: Owergrown Reeds
desc: Sunlight reflects through it.

name: Stubborn Drake
desc: Uhh. Peace was an option?

desc:
Waves are dancing on the water surface.

desc: Calming aura radiates around.

desc: Choose a perk to shape your character.

name: Screaming Goat
desc: Producing various unpleasant noises.

name: Animal Trap

Something is likely captured inside.
Shaking around vigorously.

name: Velvet Bandit
desc:
Kinda cute on the first glance.
Ferocious on the second.

name: Spoiled Cheese
desc:
Actually smells terrible.
Still tempting though.

name: Primitive Basket

name: Ginger Root

name: Simple Hut
desc: A simple tent and a campfire.

name: Pile of Bones
desc: Adventures seem to usually end here.

Noticed suspicious activity in their hut.
"Human no walk here!"

name: Radiating Jewel
desc: Polished to perfection.

desc: Compelling smell fills the air.

Sunlight reflects through it.

Loud stomps follow its steps.

desc: Seems angry of the disturbance.

desc: Murky water bubbles all around.

desc: Murky water bubbles all around.

desc: Calming aura radiates around.

desc: xyxy.

Found buried inside the undead meat.

desc: Disgusting on sight.

desc:
There is a tent and a campfire.
No one seems to be around.

desc:
Laying among a bunch of other junk.

name: Book of Spells
desc:
Radiates with magic energy.

desc:
Noticed suspicious activity in their camp.

name: Cemetery Wall
desc: Eerie atmosphere in the air.

desc: Seems recently tampered with.
message: Corpse has risen from the ground.

name: Animated Dead
desc: Surely carries a lot of diseases.

name: Meatfly Worm
desc:
Found buried inside the undead meat.
Unsettling fishing bait.

desc: The glowing gem shines bright.

desc:
Probably packs a ton of nutrients.
Give it a shot?

name: Old Potato
desc: Looks suspiciously fresh.

name: Massive Statue

name: Burial Urn
desc: These shall not be disturbed.

name: Untangible Ghost

name: Spruce Trees

A small group of trees.
Finally chance to rest.

name: Bubbling Chasm
desc: Murky water bubbles all around.

name: Barred Church
desc: Strange sounds are coming from the inside.

name: Bloody Axe

name: Stack Overflow
desc: This game exists thanks to the internet.
